English
Eddie Kasalivich, an undergraduate at the University of Chicago, works as a
technician for a scientific team that discovers an alternative, low-cost,
pollution-free fuel source. When one of the chief scientists is murdered and
the invention stolen, Eddie and physicist Lily Sinclair are framed for it and
have to flee for their lives, with the FBI, CIA and other involved parties in
close pursuit. Paul Shannon, Eddies mentor, is the director of a scientific
company which - unknown to Eddie - has commercial interests in the invention.
Eddie and Lily set out to find the stolen invention and hopefully clear
themselves of the false charges.
